DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effectiveness Pralidoxime , drug use treatment pesticide poisoning ( Organophosphorous poisoning )
DOC.brief_title: Is WHO Recommended Dose Pralidoxime Effective Treatment Organophosphorus Poisoning ?
DOC.detailed_description: The present study design critically analyze role pralidoxime patient moderate severe poison divide two comparable group aspect use WHO recommend dose pralidoxime ( 30mg/kg bolus I.V 20 min follow 8mg/kg/hr continuous infusion ) . This dose continuous infusion protocol likely maintain adequate blood concentration pralidoxime throughout 24 hour thus would avoid failure effectiveness pralidoxime inconsistent blood level .
